title: California judgement exemptions. Bank levy against Wife and I. Filling out EJ160 and EJ165. Do just 1 of us fill it out?
question: Seems that the forms are written as though one person is filing it. It also asks about the spouse, and has only one signature line.
answers: If both are you are judgment debtors, then each of you must fill out a separate Claim. If one of you is a judgment debtor and the other is a third party, then the judgment debtor must fill out the Claim and the third party must file a third party claim (governed by a different set of statutes).
